article.title: Nevada U.S. Export Assistance Centers Contact Information
article.summary: Contact the Nevada U.S. Export Assistance Centers.
article.content:
​


Office Locations and Contact Information:

Nevada USEAC of Las Vegas

300 South Fourth Street, Suite 400
Las Vegas, NV 89101
Fax: 702-388-6469

Andrew Edlefsen, Director​

Tel: 702-388-6694
Andrew.Edlefsen@trade.gov

Karen Ballard, Foreign Commercial Officer

Tel: 702-388-6675
Karen.Ballard@trade.gov

Janis Kalnins, Sr. International Trade Specialist

Tel: 702-219-7461
Janis.Kalnins@trade.gov

Nevada USEAC of Reno

449 S. Virginia St, 2nd Fl
Reno, NV 89501
Fax: 775-784-5343

Our Las Vegas office is currently servicing Northern Nevada. Please contactAndrew.Edlefsen@trade.gov, 702-388-6694.​​
